ti:edition.ti:label: De Mutatione Nominum
ti:edition.ti:description: Philo Judaeus. Wendland, Paul, editor. Opera quae supersunt, Volume 3. Berlin: Reimer, 1898.

ti:translation.ti:label: De Mutatione Nominum
ti:translation.ti:description: Philo of Alexandria, "A TREATISE ON THE QUESTION WHY CERTAIN NAMES IN THE HOLY SCRIPTURES ARE CHANGED," translator: Charles Duke Yonge (George Bell and Sons, London, 1854)
